release.action: Merging small change from HEAD, IWSlideService now supports inputstream uploading. Also added isFolder method that is currently not in head Updating org.apache.slide to v.2.2b8 Updating com.idega.core to v.3.1.8
Declaration of version for including in ePlatform release 3.1
Adding auto-detection of slide store implementation. Now automatically switches to the TxFileStore implementation on databases where Slide is not supported.
Changed version for use with core 3.0.6
Changed version for use with core 3.0.5
Changed version for use with core 3.0.4
Changed version for use with core 3.0RC1
Changed version for use with core 3.0.0
Declaration of version for use with core 3.0.0
